translation.en: No, no, no.
Oh my God, no.
[Kevin] Where's my night-light when I need it? -Give me it! -[Lewis growls]
translation.es: Ahora sí necesito mi velador. ¡Dame tu linterna!

translation.en: Don't worry, we... we got this!
[Mim] Ugh, gross.
Ah! What is that? Satan? No! I hate that. I hate that.
I hate this. I hate this tunnel. What is this? Where are we?
translation.es: Odio este túnel. ¿Qué es esto? ¿Dónde estamos?

translation.en: -We should not be down here right now. -[echoing rumble]
I mean, OK, look, I know,
translation.es: Sé que esta noche ha sido una locura

translation.en: this night's been insane, and we might not make it out of this tunnel alive--
translation.es: Sé que esta noche ha sido una locura y quizá no salgamos vivas...

translation.en: -Dude! -But, I mean, you... you're Mim.
-Yes? -You're not afraid of anything.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? - Tú no le temes a nada.

translation.en: I mean, you're the bravest person I know. [chuckles]
translation.es: Nadie es más valiente que tú.

translation.en: I can't do half of the stuff that you do.
translation.es: No puedo hacer la mitad de lo que haces.

translation.en: -Clancy, look where we are right now. -[chuckles]
We are walking through this dark, disgusting tunnel at your request,
translation.es: Estamos en un túnel oscuro y asqueroso, porque tú quisiste,

translation.en: in the worst all-nighter ever,
translation.es: en la peor noche de la historia

translation.en: and we're doing it wearing the worst outfits on the planet.
translation.es: y tenemos la peor ropa del planeta.

translation.en: What is this? I hate these shorts. They come to such an unnatural length.
translation.es: ¡Odio estos pantalones! Su largo no es natural. Cubren medio muslo.

translation.en: They stop mid-thigh.
translation.es: Su largo no es natural. Cubren medio muslo.

translation.en: -[laughs] -You want brave? Mid-thigh is brave.
translation.es: ¿Dices que soy valiente? ¡Usar esto es de valientes!

translation.en: -Give me a hug. What are you doing? -[chuckles]
Aw, bring it in.
Just bring it out. Just you two. Do your thang.
translation.es: Bueno, no vengan. Hagan lo suyo solas.

translation.en: Spiderweb!
Oh, man. That was a gookie one.
Hate to see the monster that made that thing.
translation.es: No querría ver a la bestia que la tejió.

translation.en: Also, what is that?
How was your cavity search?
-Fun. -Need to find a way to reach Henry.
translation.es: Divertido. - Necesito llamar a Henry. - Sería peligroso.

translation.en: No, it's too risky. We just do what they want.
translation.es: - Necesito llamar a Henry. - Sería peligroso. Hagamos lo que piden.

translation.en: They'll disappear. Your family will be safe.
translation.es: Se irán y tu familia estará a salvo.

translation.en: Wait a second, who's Henry? Henry, your best friend from college?
translation.es: ¿Quién es Henry? ¿Tu mejor amigo de la universidad?

translation.en: Let me guess. You didn't go to college together?
translation.es: Ya sé. ¿No es de la universidad?

translation.en: Honey, he's the U.S. Marshal assigned to my case.
translation.es: Amor, es el alguacil a cargo de mi caso.

translation.en: He came over for Thanksgiving when Kevin was a baby.
translation.es: Vino el Día de Gracias cuando Kevin era bebé.

translation.en: I baked him cranberry cornbread, and he said he loved it.
translation.es: Dijo que le encantaba mi pan de arándanos y maíz.

translation.en: It was a prescheduled home visit. He did love the cornbread. We all did.
translation.es: Fue una visita programada. Pero el pan nos encantó a todos.

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't he love the cornbread?
Your Excellencies,
my wife, the Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.es: mi esposa, la condesa Van Der Holt.

translation.en: Very beautiful.
Yes, I'm a very lucky man.
translation.es: Sí, soy un hombre muy afortunado.

translation.en: I have never forgotten that.
OK, that's it. That's it. That's it! Alright, we're going home.
translation.es: Bueno, ya, se acabó. Nos vamos a casa.

translation.en: It touched my mouth. What happens if it goes in my mouth?
translation.es: Me tocó la boca, lo tengo ahí. ¿Qué me va a pasar?

translation.en: Remember when Kevin drank a glow stick and poison control said to give him milk.
translation.es: Cuando Kevin bebió un tubo luminoso, dijeron que debía tomar leche. ¡Leche!

translation.en: Can I get milk? I need some milk! Can I get some milk?
translation.es: Cuando Kevin bebió un tubo luminoso, dijeron que debía tomar leche. ¡Leche! ¡Necesito leche! ¿Me traen?

translation.en: Please excuse our assistant, he has not been feeling well.
translation.es: Discúlpenlo, - no se siente bien. - Se intoxicó.

translation.en: Food poisoning. [in French] Terrible.
translation.es: - no se siente bien. - Se intoxicó. - Terrible. - Se le intoxicó el cerebro, es eso.

translation.en: -[Ron retching] -[in English] Poisoning of the brain.
translation.es: - Terrible. - Se le intoxicó el cerebro, es eso.

translation.en: -[Margot chuckles softly] -[sighs] You know, you know what?
[chuckles] I think I'm OK.
-I'm alright, I'm OK. -[they chuckle]
-You know what? I think… I overreacted. -[Leo laughing]
I've a strong immune system. I'm... I overreact a bit. Nice to meet...
translation.es: Tengo un buen sistema inmune. Exageré. Mucho gus...

translation.en: Oh God... I think I'm OK.
-[retches] -[security] Move back!
[Mim] It just looks like somebody's gross house.
What kind of freak would actually live down here?
[woman] What kind of freaks would go snooping around
when they didn't live here? Good point.
translation.es: - sin que sea su casa? - Buen punto.

translation.en: -No! Kevin, no! -[woman] Start talking.
translation.es: ¡No lo lastimes! Habla. ¿Cómo encontraron este lugar?

translation.en: How did you find this place?
Our mom had a key! Her name's Margot Finch!
translation.es: Mi mamá, Margot Finch, tenía la llave.

translation.en: Don't know her. Wrong answer.
-[Kevin yelps] -No. Mathilde Tremblay!
He means Mathilde Tremblay.
I think she sent us here.
-How do you know Mathilde? -[Kevin] She's our mom!
translation.es: - ¿De dónde la conocen? - Es nuestra mamá.

translation.en: I think she's our mom. Please don't hurt me.
translation.es: O eso creo. No me lastimes.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, yeah. You have her eyes.
So, you know her?
Yeah. We were like sisters.
Wow. Mom is not like I thought she was.
Oh. Right.
[sighs] I just got off a job.
Oh, where do you wo...
Oh, you... you stole that stuff.
Not like a big deal or anything. We steal stuff all the time, right?
translation.es: No es la gran cosa, nosotros siempre robamos, ¿no?

translation.en: One time, I took two puddings at lunch. I'm a real bad boy.
translation.es: Una vez, tomé dos postres en vez de uno, soy malo.

translation.en: Kevin. Could you maybe just…
tell us everything you know about my mom?
translation.es: todo lo que sabes de mi mamá?

translation.en: We grew up together. Pulling jobs. Just kids' stuff, you know.
translation.es: Crecimos juntas, haciendo trabajos. Cosas de chicas.

translation.en: Scamming tourists, pickpocketing, petty theft, your basic B and E.
translation.es: Estafas a turistas, fuimos carteristas, hurtos menores, irrupciones...

translation.en: Your idea of "kid stuff" is, like, a lot different than ours.
translation.es: Tu concepto de "cosas de chicas" es muy diferente del nuestro.

translation.en: Then we got mixed up in some bad stuff with this guy named Jean-Paul.
translation.es: Luego nos metimos en líos con un tal Jean-Paul.

translation.en: J-Jean-Paul! That's the guy Henry was talking about.
translation.es: Jean-Paul. De él nos habló Henry.

translation.en: He's in prison now, but his people, they came after my mom
translation.es: Está preso, pero su gente capturó a mamá.

translation.en: and now they're planning this huge job, and we're trying to find her.
translation.es: Están planeando un golpe, y la estamos buscando.

translation.en: What makes you think she wants to be found?
translation.es: ¿Por qué creen que quiere que la encuentren?

translation.en: That necklace you're wearing. She left us the same one to get down here.
translation.es: Ese collar. Nos dejó uno idéntico para que viniéramos.

translation.en: She left us tons of clues, they all led here.
translation.es: Dejó muchas pistas que nos trajeron aquí. Nos envió contigo.

translation.en: I think she wanted us to find you so you could help us.
translation.es: Dejó muchas pistas que nos trajeron aquí. Nos envió contigo. ¿Para que nos ayudaras?

translation.en: [woman] Your mom gave me something before she went into witness protection.
translation.es: Su mamá me dio algo antes de ir a protección de testigos.

translation.en: She said I would know if it ever came time to open it.
translation.es: Dijo que sabría si llegaba el momento de abrirlo.

translation.en: -[Clancy] What is that? -[Kevin] It's a pager.
My God, the olden days were tragic.
It's not a pager.
It's an old tracking device.
[Ron] OK, I'm much better now.
Ahh... OK. Yeah. That's all.
No more is comin'... [groans]
Yeah, I think I'm done.
Oof! Stay away from the seafood dip.
translation.es: No toquen la pasta de mariscos.

translation.en: If I'm giving advice, stay away from the seafood dip
because it's mayonnaise-based.
translation.es: porque es a base de mayonesa.

translation.en: So, it's just not a good call.
So, just stay awa-- [groans]
Mm, OK. [laughs] I thought it was coming out of both ends.
translation.es: Pensé que saldría por los dos lados.

translation.en: But it didn't… [sighs] It didn't.
We're good. Everybody, we're good.
What happened to your accent?
What happened to my...
[in bad French accent] How dare you, sir?
What? Who? Sir!
How dare you...
say something like that to me
-in front of the royal family? -Save it.
-Do what? -We put in a call to your consulate.
These... are fake.
There is no Count or Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.es: No existen el conde ni la condesa Van Der Holt.

translation.en: Well, what time did you call?
-Maybe it was lunch and they-- -Keep on them.
-I'm gonna go and get this sorted out. -Yeah.
No, I'm saying, to get a croissant or…
Both ends.
Alright, she must have had a personal tracking device
implanted on her in case something ever happened.
The Grand Concert Hall downtown.
Duran Duran! They said something about the Crown of Duran Duran!
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¡Hablaron de la corona de Duran Duran!

translation.en: Durámuran? The Crown of Durámuran?
Oh, Lord... It's the Holy Grail.
They've been tracking that for years.
Your mom and I tried to steal it from the Louvre. [sighs]
translation.es: Con su mamá, una vez intentamos robarla del Louvre.

translation.en: That's a good bedtime story.
There's an event tonight at the Grand Concert Hall. A big gala.
translation.es: Hoy hay un evento de gala en la Gran Sala de Conciertos.

translation.en: You know what? If the crown is at that gala, so is your mom.
translation.es: Si la corona está ahí, su mamá también.

translation.en: OK, great! Let's go!
Um... no. I'll handle it. OK? You guys stay here. It's not a kids' job.
translation.es: No, yo me encargo. Quédense aquí, esto no es para niños.

translation.en: No. We have to go. We're not gonna get hurt, I promise.
translation.es: No, tenemos que ir. Prometo que no nos lastimaremos.

translation.en: Aw, that's so sweet. I don't care if you get hurt.
translation.es: Qué linda, pero eso no me importa.

translation.en: You'll slow me down, blow my cover.
translation.es: Serán un lastre, harán que me descubran.

translation.en: Uh, we're not slowing anybody down. We can blend in, right?
translation.es: No somos ningún lastre. Podemos mimetizarnos, ¿no?

translation.en: Is that so, General?
Actually, this insignia is for the rank of commander.
translation.es: En realidad, esta insignia es de comandante.

translation.en: But historically correct facts are not important right now.
translation.es: Pero la precisión histórica no es lo que importa ahora.

translation.en: Non-negotiable, OK?
Your mom sent you here so I would keep you safe, not send you off to get killed.
translation.es: Los enviaron para que los protegiera, no para que los maten. Pónganse cómodos.

translation.en: Make yourselves comfortable. There are video games, peanut butter…
translation.es: no para que los maten. Pónganse cómodos. Hay videojuegos, pasta de maní...

translation.en: -I'm allergic to peanuts. -Same.
translation.es: - Soy alérgico al maní. - Y yo.

translation.en: [sighs] You're not coming.
OK, fine.
But, uh, just out of curiosity, what is your plan?
translation.es: Pero, seré curiosa, ¿cuál es tu plan?

translation.en: I'll go into an air vent that'll lead me to the subway and take me directly to the Grand Concert Hall downtown.
translation.es: Iré por la ventilación al metro, y de ahí, a la Gran Sala de Conciertos.

translation.en: Anything else?
Yeah, which vent was that?
[grunts] The one right over...
Please don't find me and kill me. I just need to get my mom back.
translation.es: No me busques para matarme. Solo quiero recuperar a mi mamá.

translation.en: -Not bad. -[chuckles]
Although I definitely will find you and kill you.
translation.es: Pero sí te buscaré y te mataré.

translation.en: -You'll kill her, but we're cool, right? -Thanks, lady.
Oh! Come on!
-I'm not allowed on public transport-- -We know!
translation.es: No puedo usar transporte público... ¡Ya sabemos!

translation.en: Where now?
-Um... This way! Come on. -[Kevin] OK!
[Mim] We're never getting past that security.
translation.es: No podremos evadir a tantos guardias.

translation.en: I don't know about you guys, but we might be able to get in.
translation.es: No sé ustedes, pero nosotros podríamos entrar.

translation.en: Have you seen yourself?
Oh, you're right. It's the cravat.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Es el pañuelo del cuello.

translation.en: Hey, what about up there?
[Clancy] Window's open.
You'll never fit.
I'll do it.
Oh, doesn't your mom have a rule about breaking into buildings at night?
translation.es: ¿Tu mamá no te prohibió irrumpir en edificios en plena noche?

translation.en: My mom is not here.
-He took off the cape. -OK.
-[Lewis] Hold my hat. -Snap!
[groans] Come on, Lewis.
Make it happen, Lewis. [grunts]
-You can give me a hand with this part. -[Mim] Right.
translation.es: - Con esto sí me pueden ayudar. - Claro, estábamos mirando.

translation.en: -We were watching. -[Kevin] I had the hat.
translation.es: - Con esto sí me pueden ayudar. - Claro, estábamos mirando. Perdón.

translation.en: -[Clancy] Sorry. There you go. OK -[Mim] There it is.
[Kevin] You got this!
-[Lewis grunts] -[Kevin] Squeeze! Squeeze!
-Oh my God. -Oh my God. Look at that.
-He's really doin' it- -[Lewis yelps]
-[thud, clatter] -Uh-oh. It's OK. Walk it off.
-You're good. -[Clancy chuckles]
-Does he know where to go? -I hope so.
OK.
Hey! What are you guys doing back here?
Uh, we... We were just, um…
Oh my gosh, we've been wandering around this place forever.
translation.es: Dios, ¡hace rato que damos vueltas sin parar!

translation.en: So, uh, which way to the stage? Yeah, we just need to set up.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el escenario? Tenemos que preparar todo.

translation.en: Just got in from Denver. What a cluster that airport is. Am I right?
translation.es: Recién llegamos de Denver. Ese aeropuerto es imposible, ¿no?

translation.en: Never been there.
We're the kid musical ensemble booked for tonight.
translation.es: Somos el grupo musical que cantará hoy.

translation.en: Paul Revere's Midnight Ride?
Never heard of us? We're pretty big on YouTube.
translation.es: ¿No nos conoces? Somos muy populares en YouTube.

translation.en: Mim, show him the video. The viral one.
translation.es: Mim, muéstrale el video. El que se viralizó.

translation.en: Two-point-three million hits and climbing.
translation.es: Ya lo vieron 2.3 millones y sigue subiendo.

translation.en: Come on. You think we dress like this for kicks?
translation.es: ¿Crees que nos vestimos así porque sí?

translation.en: Alright, alright, come on. Come on.
[Kevin] Good evening. Tut-tut. We are Paul Revere's Midnight Ride.
translation.es: Buenas noches. Somos La Cabalgata de Paul Revere.

translation.en: We have an amazing performance planned for everyone here.
translation.es: Preparamos un show espectacular para todos ustedes.

translation.en: So, to kick the night off,
we have Cool Clancy on the cello.
-Let's strike up the band! -[tepid applause]
[whispers] Sit down.
[whispers] Kevin...
[whispers] No. [sighs] I can't... I'm not like you.
translation.es: No. No puedo. No soy como tú.

translation.en: [sighs] I knew it. I knew it!
Uh... Security?
We got a mess down here on the stage. Kids in pilgrim shoes.
translation.es: Al escenario. Hay unos chicos vestidos de peregrinos.

translation.en: -[oboe squeaks] -Clancy, we need you to go. Now.
I can't play in front of all these people.
translation.es: No puedo delante de tanta gente.

translation.en: Of course, you can. You got this! Quickly!
-[sighs] I'm not ready. -Yes, you are.
translation.es: No estoy lista. Claro que sí. Eres muy talentosa.

translation.en: -You're so talented. -I need backup ASAP, please.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Eres muy talentosa. Necesito refuerzos. Tienen camisas con volados.

translation.en: We got kids in puffy shirts. I need backup!
translation.es: Necesito refuerzos. Tienen camisas con volados. ¡Refuerzos!

translation.en: -Backup ASAP, please! Thank you. -Wait, wait.
Alright, we've got new orders to take 'em to the embassy.
translation.es: Bien. Nos ordenaron llevarlos a la embajada.

translation.en: FBI is involved. Apparently, there's some security risk.
translation.es: El FBI está en esto. Parece que hay un riesgo de seguridad.

translation.en: Take care of it.
Oh, you two have a secret code now, a secret language.
translation.es: Tienen un código secreto, un idioma secreto.

translation.en: Is that what's going on? That's... perfect.
-[Leo speaking French] -What does that mean, Leo?
-Duck! -[Ron] What?
-[guard 3 grunts] -What's happening?
Uh, cancel that. They're legit.
Let's go.
Where'd you learn that? Did you just kill that guy?
No, I just crushed his windpipe a little. He'll be fine with immediate medical attention.
translation.es: Le aplasté un poco la tráquea. Solo deben asistirlo pronto.

translation.en: "Crushed his wind pi--" Have you ever killed anyone?
No! Our paramilitary training taught us how to neutralize a target
translation.es: No, en el entrenamiento paramilitar enseñan a neutralizar

translation.en: in under four seconds using mostly non-fatal tactics.
translation.es: en cuatro segundos con tácticas no letales.

translation.en: "Paramilitary training"? "Non-fatal"?
You made me open up a jar of mustard for you last week.
translation.es: El otro día me pediste que te abriera un frasco de mostaza.

translation.en: You faked it!
-I faked it. -Oh my God. Is our whole life a lie?
translation.es: - Sí. - Dios, ¿toda nuestra vida es mentira?

translation.en: -What do we... What do we... What... -[Margot panting]
Who did I marry?
Is that Clancy?
Sounds like Clancy.
[Margot] Kids, stay there. I'm coming for you.
Mom!
Is this what Mom does when we're asleep?
Oh... knock it off!
-Dad does not look good. -Nuh-uh.
Oh my God, she looks amazing!
There's a guy there.
Make way! Move!
-Crown. Get the-- -[man screams]
Come on, jump!
-Clancy. -Hi.
We gotta get outta here.
-Come on! -[Ron] How did you guys get here?
-[overlapping voices] -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Is that gonna be my car? Can I learn to drive?
translation.es: Encontramos el código de la señora Finch en la mesada y...

translation.en: [Mim] So great. Then we found a secret hideout. [Kevin] Then, Jay tracked you with your GPS chip.
translation.es: - Y encontramos su guarida. - Y Jay te rastreó con tu chip.

translation.en: [Margot] Kids, I'm sorry I got you involved in all this.
translation.es: Lamento mucho haberlos metido en todo esto.

translation.en: No, Mom. I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.es: No, yo lamento lo que te dije.

translation.en: You're not pathetic, you're amazing, and I know you might miss your old life,
translation.es: No eres patética, eres increíble. Extrañarás tu vieja vida,

translation.en: but we had to find you and try and get you back. Just please don't go.
translation.es: pero teníamos que encontrarte. Por favor, no te vayas.

translation.en: Honey, I would never leave you!
Hey, old friend.
Looks like your grand plan worked. Here I am. And I…
translation.es: Parece que tu plan funcionó. Heme aquí. E...

translation.en: pulled a twofer.
Course you did.
-Yeah. -[Ron] Sorry, do we know her?
Oh, don't worry, she's a good guy. Well, kind of a bad guy.
translation.es: Sí, descuida, es buena. Bueno, es medio mala.

translation.en: She's a good bad guy.
-We should go. -Go.
I'm gonna keep 'em busy, erase all the footage…
Hey, you. No, no, no. Hand over the Rolex.
translation.es: No, tú no. Dame ese Rolex.

translation.en: You have, like, a thousand.
Thank you, good bad guy.
Thank you. I knew you'd know what to do.
translation.es: Gracias. Sabía que sabrías qué hacer.

translation.en: Yeah. I was ready. I just never pictured it with… kids.
translation.es: Sí. Estaba lista, pero nunca imaginé que sería con niños.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Your kids. But…
I kind of like it.
Thank you.
You live here? In downtown?
It's actually more of a safe house that I keep for emergencies, but, yeah.
translation.es: Digamos que es mi refugio para emergencias.

translation.en: [Kevin] That's so cool! Dad, isn't that cool?
Eh, is it cool? Or is it fiscally irresponsible?
You know, because rent downtown is very expensive, son.
translation.es: Los alquileres del centro son carísimos.

translation.en: Hey, thanks for sittin' on the towel, bud.
translation.es: Gracias por sentarte sobre la toalla.

translation.en: I appreciate you not getting vomit on the Corinthian leather.
translation.es: Valoro que no manches de vómito la alfombra de cuero. Entiendes, ¿no?

translation.en: -You understand, right? -Yeah, I understand, Leo.
translation.es: Valoro que no manches de vómito la alfombra de cuero. Entiendes, ¿no? Sí, entiendo, Leo.

translation.en: Honey, how's your arm? What happened?
Oh, I don't know. It was a blur.
translation.es: No lo sé. No recuerdo bien.

translation.en: Lot of fists were flying around. And I think I punched a couple of guys.
translation.es: Muchos puños en el aire. Creo que les pegué a unos tipos.

translation.en: Uh, I mean... I think that may have happened when you fell down, awkwardly.
translation.es: Quizá pasó cuando te caíste con mucha torpeza. Debe ser un moretón.

translation.en: -Probably only a bruise. -I think it's a bit more than a bruise.
translation.es: Quizá pasó cuando te caíste con mucha torpeza. Debe ser un moretón. Yo creo que es un poco más, Leo.

translation.en: -Uh, maybe like a funny bone. -Nah, I don't think it's a funny bone.
translation.es: Quizá sea un tirón. No, no me parece.

translation.en: Uh, you know. -Uh-huh. -[Leo] OK, well, you know.
-I mean... -[Ron] Agree to disagree.
Actually, I'm gettin' a bit numb, so it's probably gonna affect my work.
translation.es: Se me está adormeciendo, quizá afecte mi trabajo.

translation.en: Oh. Uh, you're a surgeon?
No, Leo. I am…
a pastry chef, and I need my finger strength and dexterity, so there you go.
translation.es: pastelero, y necesito fuerza en los dedos. Es eso.

translation.en: Is that a real Capicchioni?
-[Margot] We're all safe. -You know that. [laughs] Yeah, it is.
-[Clancy] Can you play? -[Leo] Sure.
There he goes, exposing more flesh. Who is he doing that for?
translation.es: Miren cómo expone más piel. ¿Para quién es todo esto?

translation.en: His arms are like Popeye's. It's unbelievable.
Alright.
I activated emergency protocol. We're all safe now.
translation.es: Activé el protocolo de emergencia. Ya está. Hay que esperar a que Henry me contacte.

translation.en: Just have to wait for Henry to contact me.
translation.es: Ya está. Hay que esperar a que Henry me contacte.

translation.en: How much is this worth, anyway?
I'd say somewhere in the ballpark of 20 million.
[Kevin] Crazy! Twenty million?
We're giving it back. It doesn't belong to us.
translation.es: Vamos a devolverla. No es nuestra.

translation.en: But, Mom, you used to steal stuff all the time when you were younger.
translation.es: Pero, cuando eras joven, te la pasabas robando

translation.en: -It was pretty cool. -No.
Why can't we just say we lost it or something?
Kev, listen to me. I was wrong.
